过渡区位置说明: 0% = Extend into narrow track, 100% = Extend into wide track
若圆角导致间距报错，自动尝试缩小半径: If rounded corners cause spacing errors, automatically try to reduce radius
自动合并中间的过渡线段以生成圆弧: Automatically merge intermediate transition segments to generate arcs
短线段导致圆弧不相切也生成（半径减小）: Generate arcs even if short segments cause non-tangency (radius reduced)
防止段数过多导致卡顿: Maximum segments for width transition, prevent lag from too many segments
请先选择要处理的导线: Please select wires to process first
当前布线状态与最新快照一致，无需重复创建: Current routing state matches latest snapshot, no need to create duplicate
!!! 警告：快照所属PCB与当前不一致 !!!\n\n可能会导致数据错乱，系统:
!!! Warning: Snapshot PCB doesn't match current !!!

May cause data corruption, system will try to backup current state. Continue?
确定恢复快照？当前未保存的修改将丢失。: Restore snapshot? Unsaved changes will be lost.
请先打开PCB文档: Please open a PCB document first
